wikipedia_page.main: Arthur Whitcliffe Davies (30 August 1878 – 14 September 1966) was an American-born Anglican priest in the 20th century. He was the son of British businessman Theophilus Harris Davies, founder of Theo H. Davies & Co.

response: * Rev. Dr. Arthur Whitcliffe Davies, M.A., D.Litt. (1913–1928)
